title: Characterization of the 3,4-Dichloroaniline Degradation Gene Cluster in
authors: Gibu N, Kasai D, Sato S, Tabata M, Vangnai A, Fukuda M
abstract: 3,4-Dichloroaniline (34DCA), a major metabolite of phenylurea herbicides, causes environmental contamination owing to its toxicity and recalcitrant properties.
